== Security maintenance of the mobile kernel ==
* Security team (KeesCook and JamieStrandboge) to track CVEs
** They will send _all_ kernel CVEs to ubuntu-kernel and ubuntu-mobile ML
* Kernelteam will pull from the kernel security tree
** when the patch isn't in the Ubuntu security git tree on zinc (kernel.u.c), Amit will apply the patch to our tree
* Security team has a central CVE tracker
